  • Constructor Details

    • Cursor

      public Cursor(long id, int posX, int posY, float thickness, float rotationAngle, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, float opacity, boolean isVisible)
      Complete Constructor of the class Cursor :
      Parameters:
      id - the identification of the cursor.
      posX - the position on horizontal axe.
      posY - the position on vertical axe.
      thickness - the integer value of the cursor's thickness.
      rotationAngle - the current rotation of the cursor in degrees between 0 and 360°.
      color - the color of the cursor.
      opacity - the opacity of the cursor between 0f and 1f.
      isVisible - the boolean check for the cursor's visibility.

    • Cursor

      public Cursor(long id)
      A Constructor of the class Cursor with a predefined id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the newly created Cursor

    • moveCursor

      public void moveCursor(int posX, int posY)
      Move the cursor on the Canva using the relative position
      Parameters:
      posX - the amount to move in pixel on the horizontal axe.
      posY - the amount to move in pixel on the vertical axe.

    • forward

      public void forward(double value)
      Move the cursor forward
      Parameters:
      value - the value from witch the cursor will advance
      Throws:
      NegativeNumberException - verify the cursor is not out of the canvas
